meta.description: Historical PERMA-V wellness assessments — tracks wellbeing across 6 dimensions over time

assessments.context: Pre-shutdown anxiety week. California trip canceled (weather/baby safety). Storm aftermath. Multiple urgent deadlines. Still employed but counting down. Robin 7 months old.

annotations.positive_emotion: Trip cancellation disappointing; storm anxiety; but family safe
annotations.engagement: 5+ parallel Claude sessions; Tonkotsu 50+ hrs running; hyperfocused on technical work
annotations.relationships: Robin play ideas listed but 'sleeping after rough night'; no social connections; solo computer work
annotations.meaning: PT referral urgency shows health purpose; systems for post-company life; existential tension from countdown
annotations.accomplishment: Tonkotsu 30,740 lines delivered; merge success; deployment evaluation; storm survived
annotations.vitality: CPAP avg 4.86 hrs (subtherapeutic); AHI 2.24 acceptable; Day 166 post-surgery without PT

assessments.context: Company shutdown week. Jan 31 = last day at Panasonic. Equipment return logistics. Major life transition. 6-8 sessions/day. 'Pre-transition anxiety' explicit. Recovery mode acknowledged.

annotations.positive_emotion: 'Pre-transition anxiety' explicit; 'last evening with work laptop' emotional; relief mixed with loss
annotations.engagement: Peak session count 6-8/day; Inter-Claude Coordination System built in 3 hrs; absorption as coping mechanism
annotations.relationships: Katherine birthday needs planning; thank-you notes undone; equipment return is technical not human
annotations.meaning: 'The system built itself while you recovered' — sense of legacy; losing professional identity offset by family grounding
annotations.accomplishment: Inter-Claude system complete; 42GB freed; folder notes fixed; 'day perfect multi-session coordination was achieved'
annotations.vitality: CPAP avg 4.98 hrs still subtherapeutic; sessions at 3 AM; 'rest is productive' repeated = likely not resting

assessments.context: Post-company Day 6. OMC removed, superpowers installed. Acupuncture session. 12 Claude sessions (peak day). Massive vault cleanup (126 files relocated, 96MB removed). PT confirmed for Feb 9.

annotations.positive_emotion: Acupuncture = self-care investment; PT confirmed = hope; vault cleaner = satisfaction; but car registration overdue
annotations.engagement: 12 sessions = highest single-day; decisive architecture moves; postmortem shows reflective engagement not just volume
annotations.relationships: Family in frontmatter but no activities logged; acupuncture solo; all 12 sessions solo; thank-you notes still undone
annotations.meaning: Postmortem writing = meaning-making from failure; ACE effort notes for recovery, OK settling, infrastructure; PERMA-V first linked
annotations.accomplishment: Root dir 178 to 6 files; branches 8 to 0; pipeline green; quantifiably most productive day in dataset
annotations.vitality: CPAP improving to 5.76 avg but Feb 7 crashed to 0.5 hrs after marathon; AHI 3.13 elevated; 12-session day unsustainable

assessments.context: Baseline self-assessment. First full week in Ardmore. Systems established. MCP recovery work. Heavy infrastructure day.

annotations.positive_emotion: Self-reported baseline — note discrepancy with data-driven Feb 6 estimate (4.5). Self-reports tend optimistic.
annotations.engagement: Consistent with data signals — deep technical engagement confirmed
annotations.relationships: Self-rated highest dimension — family move to Oklahoma strengthening connections
annotations.meaning: Moderate — purpose emerging but not yet crystallized through counseling
annotations.accomplishment: Self-rated lowest — honest about physical limitations restricting output
annotations.vitality: Self-rated 7.2 vs data-estimated 5.0 on Feb 6 — possible optimism bias or genuine good day

assessments.context: Post-counseling assessment. Therapy addressed: spiritual growth through adversity, finding purpose helping others, honest reckoning with physical limitations, self-reliance to help-seeking shift.

annotations.positive_emotion: Down 0.5 — honest reckoning with pain/frustration, but actively reframing ('blessings in the ashes' homework)
annotations.engagement: Stable — deep tech engagement continues; therapy itself is engaging; session count normalizing to sustainable 3/day
annotations.relationships: Stable at 8.5 — Robin motivating recovery; Katherine supported; counselor connection; community outreach starting
annotations.meaning: Up 1.0 — biggest shift. Purpose in helping others with similar injuries; spiritual growth; God's refinement; Little James testimony
annotations.accomplishment: Stable — 'only thing done is therapy' but NotebookLM SSOT closed, feedback doc written, calendar integrated
annotations.vitality: Down 0.7 — therapy surfaced honest picture: diaphragm damage, driving/shopping difficulty, pain/positioning issues

key_themes: Spiritual growth through adversity — God's refinement process
Finding purpose in helping others with similar injuries
Honest reckoning with physical limitations (driving, shopping, pain)
Positive reframing: sympathetic overdrive vs. calm perspective
The Chosen — Little James with limp as testimony of faith
therapy_notes.homework: Where are the blessings in the ashes?
